page.title: 20Clubs.
page.content: SCOUTS. We have only about eight Scouts in our troop.That is only just enough for one Patrol.Scouts do things like orienteering.Our Scout troop is from 7.00pm to 9.00pm and is on a Thursday night.We have scouts in the Village hall and have to pay one pound fifty five a month. We have to learn a lot of knots like reef ,sheep bend,half hitch,hitch etc. We have two Patrol tents and four leader tents. YOUTH CLUB. We hold our Youth Club at Springhill Prison Estate.It is held on a Wednesday night.At Christmas the Youth Club produced a play for the infants.The Youth Club has been roller skating before.The entrance fee is 25p.
